channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump calls Musk’s new America Party ‘ridiculous’: ‘Starting a third party just adds to confusion’

item.title: U.K. business leaders are ‘struggling to see what’s business-friendly’ about Labour
item.description: The government is trying to balance business, unions, and a divided electorate. At the moment, it doesn’t appear to be satisfying any of them.

item.title: Crew abandons Greek-owned cargo ship attacked in the Red Sea after it starts to take on water

item.title: Israel launches airstrikes at Yemen’s Houthi rebels and Houthis fire 2 missiles back in response

item.title: Europe’s corporations enter new era of cooperation with E.U. to bolster competitiveness against the U.S. and China
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.
